description:
!!! Please do not change the dashboard !!!
 If you want to add meaningful content please get in touch with the EvilTwinsâ„¢

graphs.query:
dataSource.vendor='EvilTwins'
| group c=count()
graphs.title: Activities

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' 
| lookup action from "s1mgmtactivities" by id=activity.activity.type
| group NumberOfActivities=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.activity.type, action
| sort -NumberOfActivities
| limit 20
| columns "#"=NumberOfActivities, Activity=action, ActivityID=format("%d", activity.activity.type)
graphs.title: Top20 - Activities

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' 
| lookup action from "s1mgmtactivities" by id=activity.activity.type
| group NumberOfActivities=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.activity.type, action
| columns  Activity=action, NumberOfActivities
| limit 20
| sort -NumberOfActivities
graphs.title: Top20  Activities

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' 
| group NumberOfActivities=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.site.name 
| sort -NumberOfActivities
| limit 20
| columns "#"=NumberOfActivities, Site=activity.site.name
graphs.title: Top20 - sites with most activities

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' 
| group NumberOfActivities=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.site.name 
| sort NumberOfActivities
| limit 20
| columns "#"=NumberOfActivities, Site=activity.site.name
graphs.title: Top20 - sites with lowest activities

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type=133
| parse "user $user$ failed" from activity.description.primary
| group NumberOfFailedLogins=count(user) by user
| columns user, NumberOfFailedLogins
| sort -NumberOfFailedLogins
| limit 10
graphs.title: Top10 Users with failed logins

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (23,27,35,36,133,134,138,140,142,143,144,1023,3713,3714,3715)
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group NumberOfActivities=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.activity.type, action
| columns NumberOfActivities, Activities=action
| sort -NumberOfActivities
graphs.title: Number of activities by type

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' not(activity.data.username='')
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group NumberOfActivities=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.data.username 
| filter activity.data.username != null
| columns UserName=activity.data.username, NumberOfActivities
| sort -NumberOfActivities
| limit 10
graphs.title: Top 10 Users with most activties

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type=138
| group NumberOfActivities=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.data.username 
| columns UserName=activity.data.username, NumberOfActivities
| sort -NumberOfActivities
graphs.title: Users with unrestricted sessions

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (17,43,47,48,49,50,51,52,53,54,55,74,89,93)
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group NumberOfEvents=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.activity.type, action
| columns TypeOfEvent=action, NumberOfEvents
| sort -NumberOfEvents
graphs.title: Number of Events by type

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (17,47,48,51) dataSource.category = 'security'
| group Subcribed=count(activity.activity.type where activity.activity.type=17), Recommissioned=count(activity.activity.type where activity.activity.type=48), Decommissioned=0-count(activity.activity.type where activity.activity.type=47), Uninstalled=0-count(activity.activity.type where activity.activity.type=51) by timebucket()
graphs.title: Delta of Agents (subscribed/recommissioned to uninstalled/decommissioned)

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (117,118,119,120,126,127,128)
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group NumberOfEvents=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.activity.type, action
| columns NumberOfEvents, TypeOfIncident=action
| sort -NumberOfEvents
graphs.title: Number of Events by type

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (117,118,119,120,126,127,128)
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group n=newest(activity.agent.id) by activity.activity.type, activity.data.computerName, activity.account.name, activity.site.name, action
| filter activity.activity.type!=118 activity.activity.type!=120
| columns AccountName=activity.account.name, SiteName=activity.site.name, EndpointName=activity.data.computerName, AgentStatus=action
| sort AccountName, SiteName, EndpointName
graphs.title: Enpoints to take care of!!

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (18, 19, 20, 3608, 3757, 4001, 4003, 4008, 4009, 4104, 4105, 4106, 4107, 4108, 4109, 4110, 4111, 4112)
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group NumberOfIncidents=count(activity.activity.type) by activity.activity.type, action
| columns NumberOfIncidents, TypeOfIncident=action
| sort -NumberOfIncidents
graphs.title: Number of Incidents by type

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (18,19,20,4001,4003,4009,4104,4105,4106,4107,4108,4109,4110,4111,4112)
| group NumberOfIncidents=count() by activity.account.name, activity.site.name, action
| columns AccountName=activity.account.name, SiteName=activity.site.name, NumberOfIncidents
| sort -NumberOfIncidents, AccountName, SiteName
| limit 20
graphs.title: Top 20 Sites with most incidents

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (3608,3757)
| group NumberOfAlerts=count() by activity.data.rulename
| columns RuleName=activity.data.rulename, NumberOfAlerts
| sort -NumberOfAlerts,RuleName
| limit 20
graphs.title: STAR Custom Rules with most hits

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (3608,3757)
| group NumberOfAlerts=count() by activity.data.id, activity.data.rulename, activity.data.rulescopelevel, activity.data.fullScopeDetailsPath
| columns NumberOfAlerts, ScopeName=activity.data.fullScopeDetailsPath, RuleName=activity.data.rulename
| sort -NumberOfAlerts, ScopeName, RuleName
| limit 20
graphs.title: STAR Custom Rules with most hits by Scope

graphs.query:
event.type='Activity' activity.activity.type in (4104,4105,4106,4107)
| let Action=((activity.activity.type=4104) ? 'Manually marked as Malicious' : (activity.activity.type=4105) ? 'Manually marked as Suspicious' : (activity.activity.type=4106) ? 'Automatically marked as Malicious' : (activity.activity.type=4107) ? 'Automatically marked as Suspicious' : '-')
| group NumberOfAlerts=count() by activity.data.ruleName, Action
| columns NumberOfAlerts, Action, RuleName=activity.data.ruleName
| sort -NumberOfAlerts,RuleName
| limit 20
graphs.title: STAR Custom Rules with Active Responses

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type=5126 activity.data.eventType='connected'
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| group NumberOfConnections=count(activity.data.deviceClass) by Description
| columns NumberOfConnections, USBClass=Description
| sort -NumberOfConnections
| limit 20
graphs.title: Top 20 USB Classes connected

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type=5126
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.activity.type, action, Description
| columns ActivityType=action, USBDeviceClass=Description, NumberofEvents=c
| sort -NumberofEvents
graphs.title: Number of 'Device Control Approved' Events

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type=5126
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.activity.type, action, Description
| columns USBDeviceClass=Description, NumberofEvents=c
| sort -NumberofEvents
graphs.title: 'Device Control Approved' Events by DeviceClass

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type in(5125, 5126)
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.activity.type, action
| columns EventType=action, NumberofEvents=c
graphs.title: 'Device Control' Events

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type=5125
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.activity.type, action, Description
| columns ActivityType=action, USBDeviceClass=Description, NumberofEvents=c
| sort -NumberofEvents
graphs.title: Number of 'Device Control Blocked' Events

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type=5125
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.activity.type, action, Description
| columns USBDeviceClass=Description, NumberofEvents=c
| sort -NumberofEvents
graphs.title: 'Device Control Blocked' Events by DeviceClass

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type in (5125,5126) activity.data.interface='USB'
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.data.uid, activity.activity.type, action, Description
| columns NumberofEvents=c, ActivityType=action, USBDeviceClass=Description, USBDeviceID=activity.data.uid
| sort -NumberofEvents
graphs.title: Number of 'Device Control' Events by SerialNumber

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type in (5125,5126) activity.data.interface='USB'
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.agent.id, activity.data.computerName, activity.activity.type, action, Description
| columns NumberofEvents=c, ActivityType=action, USBDeviceClass=Description, EndpointName=activity.data.computerName
| sort -NumberofEvents
graphs.title: Number of 'Device Control' Events by Endpoint

graphs.query:
event.type ='Activity' activity.activity.type in (5125,5126) activity.data.interface='USB'
| lookup Description from "usbclasses" by BaseUSBClass=activity.data.deviceClass
| lookup action from 's1mgmtactivities' by id=activity.activity.type
| group c=count() by activity.data.lastLoggedInUserName, activity.activity.type, action, Description
| columns NumberofEvents=c, ActivityType=action, USBDeviceClass=Description, UserName=activity.data.lastLoggedInUserName
| sort -NumberofEvents
graphs.title: Number of 'Device Control' Events by Endpoint
